details.rationale: Issue #465 contains zero production code changes. All changes are documentation (README.md), test infrastructure (tests/), baselines (docs/baselines/), and CI receipts. Mutation testing is designed to validate test strength against production code mutations, particularly neural network critical paths (quantization, kernels, inference). For documentation-only changes, mutation testing provides no value.

recommendations.for_future_changes: If Issue #465 evolves to include production code changes (e.g., new quantization algorithms, kernel implementations, or inference engine modifications), re-run mutation testing focusing on those specific crates with â‰¥80% mutation score threshold.
recommendations.test_hardening: Test utilities in issue_465_test_utils.rs demonstrate good practices (schema validation, kernel hygiene checks, CPU baseline verification). Consider extracting these utilities to common test infrastructure for reuse across other test suites.
